sentences.english: As for our redeemer, the LORD of hosts is his name, the Holy One of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 我們救贖主的名是萬軍之耶和華以色列的聖者。

sentences.english: Heir of salvation, purchase of God, born of his Spirit, washed in his blood.
sentences.chinese: 爲父神後嗣，已得救贖，從聖靈得生，寶血洗淨。

sentences.english: There's a lot more than sex implied in this redemptive touching.
sentences.chinese: 在這救贖的觸碰裏不僅只有性。

sentences.english: Women have to be modestly dressed,no jewelry, saved through childbearing.
sentences.chinese: 女人必須衣着簡樸，不能戴首飾，通過生育得到救贖。

sentences.english: Redemptive work of the Holy Spirit is inherently eschatological.
sentences.chinese: 聖靈的救贖工作，本質上是末世性的。

sentences.english: We have been washed and purified by his saving death!
sentences.chinese: 他救贖的死已經洗清了我們，潔淨了我們。
靈知主義並不能被描述爲“自我救贖”。

sentences.english: As Man Wenjun still acts as image ambassador, should he be blocked or saved?
sentences.chinese: 滿文軍仍任形象大使，該封殺還是救贖？

sentences.english: Rescue us from false gods and substitutes that claim redemptive powers.
sentences.chinese: 求禰救我們脫離那些自稱具救贖力的假神和替代物。

sentences.english: And thinks that the developing orbit is from recieving soul to upspring desire.
sentences.chinese: 並指出其發展軌跡是從靈魂救贖到慾望高蹈的過程。

sentences.english: Arise for our help, and redeem us for thy mercies' sake.
sentences.chinese: 求你起來幫助我們，憑你的慈愛救贖我們。

sentences.english: Do you remember the line from movie Shawshank Redemption?Fear can hold you prisoner, hope can set you free…
sentences.chinese: 還記得電影《肖申克的救贖》中的那句臺詞嗎？

sentences.english: Maradona atoned by inspiring Argentina to win the next World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 馬拉多納通過激勵阿根廷獲得世界盃冠軍獲得了救贖。

sentences.english: Rise up and help us; redeem us because of your unfailing love.
sentences.chinese: 求你起來幫助我們，憑你的慈愛救贖我們。
敵人，潔淨他的地，救贖他的百姓。

sentences.english: Thus dispensationalists have misconstrued God's work of salvation and (again) the newness ofthe New Covenant.
sentences.chinese: 因此，時代論者曲解了神的救贖工作和新約的新義。

definition: to deprive/to expropriate/to strip (sb of his property)
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
